actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend the Metropolitan Washington Airports Act of 1986 authorizing the Secretary of Transportation to ensure that the American public is fully and properly informed about the perquisites and privileges afforded to Members of Congress who use parking facilities through the Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority.

summary.text: Truth in Airport Parking Act - Amends the Metropolitan Washington Airports Act of 1986 to direct the Secretary of Transportation and the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to ensure that Airport Authority facilities that receive Federal aid and provide special parking privileges, including free parking, to Members of Congress and other Federal officials post signs that clearly indicate that such Members and officials are receiving such privileges and that such parking is federally-funded.

titles.title: To amend the Metropolitan Washington Airports Act of 1986 authorizing the Secretary of Transportation to ensure that the American public is fully and properly informed about the perquisites and privileges afforded to Members of Congress who use parking facilities through the Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority.
